
import math

a=[]
a.append(0)
a.append(1)
for i in range(2,100):
    a.append(a[i-1]+a[i-2])

T=int(raw_input())
for t in range(T):
    b=raw_input().split()
    m=int(b[0])
    n=int(b[1])
    r=int(b[2])
    
    if r>1:
        x=(n*a[r-1])+(m*a[r-2])
    else:
        x=m
    
    print x
